checkDuplicateClasses

protected void checkDuplicateClasses()
                              throws IllegalStateException
Checks if multiple front controllers are registered in the classpath. If so, IllegalStateException is thrown.

Throws:
IllegalStateException - if multiple front controllers are registered in the classpath
